title: Market share of the global luggage market 2015 , by company
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 10 number of Companys.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Company Samsonite International SA and lowest at Company Shanghai Taifeng Cases Co Ltd.
The highest Company Samsonite International SA has 16.7 more Market share than the lowest Company Shanghai Taifeng Cases Co Ltd.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Company Samsonite International SA and lowest at Company Shanghai Taifeng Cases Co Ltd.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 10 number of Companys.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Company Samsonite International SA and lowest at Company Shanghai Taifeng Cases Co Ltd.
The highest Company Samsonite International SA has 16.7 more Market share than the lowest Company Shanghai Taifeng Cases Co Ltd.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 10 number of Companys.
The maximum Market share 17.3 is found at Company Samsonite International SA and the minimum is found at Shanghai Taifeng Cases Co Ltd where Company is 0.6.
The second highest Market share is appeared to be the Company LVMH Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA.
The highest Company Samsonite International SA has 16.7 more Market share than the lowest Company Shanghai Taifeng Cases Co Ltd.

The Company Samsonite International SA has the highest Market share, followed by LVMH Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA, and Delsey SA. Down to the Company Shanghai Taifeng Cases Co Ltd which is the lowest.
Company VF Corp, and Tumi Holdings Inc share the same value 1.3.
The lowest value 0.6 at Shanghai Taifeng Cases Co Ltd is almost 5.34 times smaller than the average value 3.24.
The Market share is 32.4 if we add up values of all Companys.

data.Company: LVMH Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA
